Html:
Hello All,

I find my self in a very difficult situation. I use phpexcel to export some data from a database into excel.

It has always worked on my site until recently I changed my live server. Now it works perfectly on my two test servers but it does not work on the live. Something in the server configuration must have changed. What? I checked phpinfo and everything seems to be installed and updated.

Could you please tell me exactly what I should check on server side. Are there any permission, php special settings. I really don't know what to check anymore.

Please let me know, it could even be the most stupid thing forgotten.

Thank you very much

Mush
In what way doesn't it work? Errors, file permissions?
